allowSudo.description: Whether the user is allowed to use sudo to elevate privileges

level.description: The users permission level. Mus be one of `deny`, `show`, `deploy`, `manage`, `iam_only`

stackId.description: The stack to set the permissions for

userArn.description: The user's IAM ARN to set permissions for
